createBrute: Insert a name to create your own Brute. You will be able to fight against other Brutes in the arena and recruit new pupils. Gain experience and fight tough in the ranking to become... THE BRUTE!
otherGames: If all this unrelenting violence is too much for you, you can try our other funny games:
myHordes.desc: MyHordes: The first free zombie survival game set in a hostile world inhabited by the living dead!
eMush.desc: eMush: You're about to wake up aboard the Daedalus with 15 other rebels. Like you, they are fleeing the Mush, a parasitic fungus which is ravaging Earth and threatens Humanity.
dinorpg.desc: DinoRPG: Raise your dinoz in an extraordinary adventure game!
neoparc.desc: Neoparc: Fight other Dinoz and gradually gain experience in merciless fights!
eternalfest.desc: Eternalfest: Over 200 levels! A wide variety of very very bad enemies!
eternalKingdom.desc: Eternal Kingdom: Grow your capital. Recruit soldiers and become... Emperor!
directquiz.desc: Directquiz: Put your culture to the test in Direct Quiz, the craziest quiz game on the web!
ePopotamo.desc: ePopotamo: The relaxing word game playable in any situation!
betaDescription: This game is still in beta. Things are prone to change and bugs may occur. Please report any bug you find on our
betaReset: Keep in mind everything will be reset at the end of the beta.
log.fight.7: {{winner}} didn't even lift a finger against {{loser}}.
log.fight.21: {{loser}} didn't ask for their change back.
log.fight.31: {{loser}} picked the wrong time to mess with {{winner}}.
log.fight.46: {{winner}} created a red entry in {{loser}}'s combat log.
log.childup: Your pupil {{value}} is now stronger than before.
log.tournament: The tournament on {{date}} was canceled, try again !
seeFight: Click here to see the fight
weaponsBonuses: Weapons and bonuses available in combat
refLink: Give this web address to your friends or publish it in your blog. This will permit you to recruit pupils and access exclusive content.
chooseClanName: Choose a name for your clan
clanNameLength: The name of your clan must be between 3 and 50 characters long.
confirmJoin: Do you really want to join this clan ?
confirmCancelRequest: Do you really want to cancel your join request ?
confirmAcceptRequest: Do you really want to accept this join request ?
confirmRejectRequest: Do you really want to reject this join request ?
confirmRemoveFromClan: Do you really want to remove this member from the clan ?
bruteRemoved: The member has been removed from the clan.
confirmLeaveClan: Do you really want to leave this clan ?
title: Title
creator: Creator
confirmLockThread: Do you really want to lock this thread ?
noFightsLeft: You have no fights left today.
clanWar.earlyEnd: This war ended early because one of the clans ran out of fighters.
clanWar.earlyEndVictories: This war ended early because one of the clans reached the required number of victories.
confirmFriendlyWar: Do you really want to start a friendly war with this clan ? This will prevent you from participating in any official war for the duration of the friendly war.
friendlyWarDeclared: A friendly war has been declared.
nextFighters.desc: You can select up to 7 fighters for the next fight. If none are selected, they will be chosen randomly. Once a fighter is selected, they will be unavailable for the remainder of the war.
nextFighters.noFighters: Your clan doesn't have any fighters available for the next fight. Recruit some before the next fight or you will loose the war!
breakRoom.desc: Those fighters already fought and are currently resting. They will be unavailable for the remainder of the war.
confirmSetNewMaster: Do you really want to set this member as the new clan master ?
clanMasterChanged: The clan master has been changed.
herculeanStrength.desc: You're strong enough to move mountains, but first you must defeat your opponent.
felineAgility.desc: You don't even have a ball of string to play with, but you can always thump an opponent.
lightningBolt.desc: You strike faster than your shadow and bite harder than your opponents
vitality.desc: Your life expectancy has increased! You'll now be able to fight for longer in the arena.
immortality.desc: Your health has increases dramatically! You make it really hard for your opponents to kill you!
weaponsMaster.desc: After having mastered all edged weapons, you're a much bigger threat to your opponents.
martialArts.desc: The Chuck Norris course you took has really paid off! Now you can walk wherever you want... and more often than not it'll be all over your opponent's ugly face!
sixthSense.desc: Your eagle-eyed vigilance allows you to anticipate when your opponents are sneaking up on you. Now when you attack they won't know what hit them.
hostility.desc: You're very polite when you're fighting in the arena. Whenever one of your opponents attacks you, you return the favor......for free!
fistsOfFury.desc: ...and you scratch, claw, bite, that's just your little way of showing love! You're a mad torrent of misdirected love!
shield.desc: A shield. To stop the blows...well, some of them at least.
armor.desc: What's this? It's a coat of armour. The idea is that you put it on over your t-shirt so it doesn't get dirty. It also helps to protect you from your opponent's blows
toughenedSkin.desc: All the knocks you've taken up until now have actually helped you to develop. Your Brute is now much tougher and has a much thicker skin.
untouchable.desc: You can now avoid attacks much more easily. This is really annoying..........but only for your opponents!
sabotage.desc: Some Brutes choose to vandalize the streets, but you prefer to vandalize your opponents! Each blow can destroy one of your opponent's weapons.
sabotage.effect: 90% chance to destroy a weapon each time you land a blow
shock.desc: Your attack takes your opponent by surprise and they drops their weapon. Now you can show it off you your friends!
bodybuilder.desc: Thanks to your huge biceps you can now use heavy weapons. Bravo Mr Muscle!
relentless.desc: When you attack, you're always on target. Nobody can stop you. Most certainly not your opponent!
survival.desc: Years of fighting have made you invincible. Mortal blows have gained you 1 life point instead of knocking you out.
survival.effect: The first blow that would kill you leaves you with 1HP instead.
thief.desc: This skill allows you to discreetly steal your opponent's weapon and then use it against them.
thief.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Your brute picks up their opponent's weapon
fierceBrute.desc: Now you're a real brute. You are more powerful and violent than ever during fights.
fierceBrute.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Your Brute's blows will cause double damage during the next attack.
tragicPotion.desc: Have a little sip of this. It Could make you a bit drunk. Hic.. hic... This peach juice restored some of the health lost during the fight.
tragicPotion.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Your Brute regains between 25% and 50% HP. It also cures the Chef poison.
net.desc: A classic net. Not as cool as Spiderman's, but it's good enough for your opponent... Your enemy will be immobilised until you hit them again.
net.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) The net stops the target from evading your next attack
bomb.desc: A bit like a water bomb, but far more deadly!
bomb.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Between 15 and 25 damage inflicted on all your opponents.
hammer.desc: A catching technique which consist of jumping into the air with your opponent, and then falling on top of them.
hammer.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Your Brute inflicts heavy damage depending on the strength of your opponent.
cryOfTheDamned.desc: Fierce beasts? Pfffff... You only need to scream and they'll run for their lives!
cryOfTheDamned.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Your brute repels your opponent's animals or wakes up from a stun (50% chance of success)
hypnosis.desc: When it comes to training domestic animals or even their master, no one comes close to you. They follow you every beck and call.
hypnosis.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Your Brute takes control of your opponent's animals or convinces the opponent to spare them.
flashFlood.desc: Walking around carrying 100 kilos of weapons is very tiring but you have found a clever way of traveling light.
flashFlood.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Your Brute instantly deals massive damage to their opponent with 3 weapons.
leadSkeleton.desc: Although it's extremely heavy, a lead skeleton is essential as it considerably reduces blunt weapon damage.
balletShoes.desc: You've mastered the swan dance making it impossible for your opponent to reach you, as long as they hasn't mastered it too!
balletShoes.effect: The first blow of each fight will be automatically avoided
determination.desc: Nothing can stop you! Each defeat makes you stronger, if one of your blows fails to land, you immediately strike again!
determination.effect: If your blow does not hurt your opponent, there is a 70% chance of your Brute launching another attack.
firstStrike.desc: Your opponents enter the arena slowly, but you prefer to get stuck in straight away! You're always the first to attack!
resistant.desc: It takes your opponents endless blows to knock you out. It takes at least 5 blows before you feel anything
resistant.effect: Opponent's blows can only decrease your health bar by 20%.
counterAttack.desc: What's the best form of attack? Defense of course! You'll immediately strike back after blocking your opponent's blow.
ironHead.desc: Your opponent will be damaged by their own blows!
ironHead.effect: For each attack targeted at you, your opponent will have a 50% chance of losing their weapon.
reconnaissance.desc: You're prepared to take your time in order to analyse your opponent's weaknesses, but once you start fighting, nothing will stop you.
tamer.desc: Recycle! Make it part of your everyday cycle! You gobble up all the dead bodies in the arena.
tamer.effect: Action (x{{uses}}). Your brute regains between 20 and 50% of their health depending on the quality of the meat.
regeneration.desc: Due to your extraordinary ability to heal yourself, you never lose a fight!
regeneration.effect: You can fight twice more each day.
chef.desc: All brutes know that the biggest fight is in the canteen, not the arena!
chef.effect: Your opponents will suffer 2% damage at the end of each of their actions.
spy.desc: You've become a master in the art of misdirection. Your opponents will never know "what" hit them.
spy.effect: Swap a slightly damaged version of some of your weapons with your opponent's (Opponent -25% weapon damage)
saboteur.desc: From foam hammers to plastic swords, you're the fake weapon king! Your opponents won't notice until it's too late.
saboteur.effect: Destroy one of your opponent's weapon (opponent initiative -100 when used)
backup.desc: Friendship is all about sharing. Luckily for you, you've learnt to share your blows with your opponents so that they can have some too!
backup.effect: Your brute can help superior team-members during fights.
hideaway.desc: You really don't want to approach your opponent, you prefer to stay away and throw your whole arsenal in their face.
hideaway.effect: Chance to throw weapon: 50%. Weapons do not disappear after throwing
monk.desc: You can visualize the hits before your opponent can even think about them if you stay perfectly still.
vampirism.desc: Dracula can rest peacefully, because in his absence, it's you who takes over!
vampirism.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Deals 25% of your missing health as damage and heals you for up to twice that amount.
chaining.desc: Your hobby is ringing bells? This combo is made for you!
chaining.effect: Every 3rd consecutive melee hit will stun your opponent.
haste.desc: Have you always dreamed of moving as fast as a ninja? That's good, it's time!
haste.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Your brute will rush through your opponent, dealing additional damage that scales with your speed.
treat.desc: Fighting takes a toll. That's why I always bring a treat to put my pets back on their feet!
treat.effect: Action (x{{uses}}) Your brute will heal one of their pets for 50% of their health, make them immune to the next attack and force them to attack.
repulse.desc: Got ninja stars headed your way? No problem! Channel your inner martial arts movie hero and swat away thrown weapons like they're pesky flies.
invalidName: Invalid name. Accepted characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9, '_' and '-'. Must be between 3 and 16 characters long.
pleaseLogin: Please login before creating a Brute
goldNeededForNewBrute: You need {{gold}} Gold to create a new Brute.
sacrificeConfirm: Are you sure you want to sacrifice your brute for {{gold}} Gold ? This action cannot be undone.
resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset your brute to level 1 ? This will cost you {{gold}} Gold. This action cannot be undone.
resetEventConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset your brute to level 1 ? You will get enough XP to get back to your current level. This will cost you {{gold}} Gold. This action cannot be undone.
resetVisualsDescription: You can change your brute's appearance here. Be careful, this action cannot be undone.
resetVisualsConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset your brute's appearance ? This action cannot be undone.
callToFight: If you want to discharge your energy on someone, do it here! There are a lot of Brutes in the Arena who can't wait to swap punches!
fightLeft: You have one fight left today.
eliminatedBy: Your brute was eliminated by {{value}}. How humiliating!
comeBackInOneHour: Come back in one hour for the next fight.
tournamentVictoriesUntilRankUp: You need {{value}} daily tournament victories to rank up.
tournamentVictoriesUntilAscend: You need {{value}} daily tournament victories to ascend.
rankUpConfirm: Do you really want to rank up? Your brute will return to level 1 with the same destiny.
ascendConfirmShort: Do you really want to Ascend ?
ascendConfirm: Your brute will return to level 1 and keep its rank, previous ascension rewards and the perk you selected, which will be replaced by stats everywhere in your destiny.
youCanRegisterYourBrute: You can register your Brute for the next tournament.
arena.noXP: Your brute reached the maximum level. You can still fight, but you won't gain any more XP.
arena.search.notFound: No Brute found with this name.
chooseOneOfTheFollowingBonuses: Choose one of the following bonuses
newFightsTomorrow: {{amount}} new fights will be available tomorrow!
comeBackInAFew: Come back in a few minutes!
youHaveOneFightLeft: You have one fight left today !
selectedOpponents: Welcome to the Arena! Here is a selection of opponents of your level. Choose one and let's start the fight!
fight.step.hammer: {{brute}} dealt {{damage}} damage to {{target}} with a wrestling move.
fight.step.flashFlood: {{brute}} dealt {{damage}} damage to {{target}} by violently throwing {{weapon}}.
fight.step.vampirism: {{brute}} sucked {{opponent}}'s blood, dealing {{damage}} damage and regaining {{heal}}HP.
fight.step.treat: {{brute}} gave their pet {{target}} a treat and healed them for {{heal}}HP.
achievements.flawless.description: Fights won without taking any damage.
achievements.steal2Weapons.description: 2 weapons stolen in a single fight.
achievements.singleHitWin.description: Fights won with a single hit.
achievements.combo3.description: Combos of 3 hits performed by one of your brutes.
achievements.combo4.description: Combos of 4 hits performed by one of your brutes.
achievements.combo5.description: Combos of 5 hits performed by one of your brutes.
achievements.counter5.description: Counter 5 times in a single fight.
achievements.evade10.description: Evade 10 times in a single fight.
achievements.block25.description: Block 25 times in a single fight.
achievements.counter4b2b.description: Your brute countered 4 times in a row.
achievements.reversal4b2b.description: Your brute reversed 4 times in a row.
achievements.block4b2b.description: Your brute blocked 4 times in a row.
achievements.evade4b2b.description: Your brute evaded 4 times in a row.
achievements.throw10b2b.description: Your brute threw a weapon 10 times in a row.
achievements.disarm4.description: Your brute disarmed 4 weapons in a single fight.
achievements.disarm8.description: Your brute disarmed 8 weapons in a single fight.
achievements.damage50once.description: 50 damage dealt in a single hit.
achievements.damage100once.description: 100 damage dealt in a single hit.
achievements.hit20times.description: 20 hits landed in a single fight.
achievements.kill3pets.description: 3 pets killed in a single fight.
achievements.maxDamage.description: Max damage dealt in a single blow.
achievements.use10skills.description: 10 skills used in a single fight.
achievements.felAg_fistsOfF.description: Brutes with the skills Feline Agility and Fists of Fury.
achievements.felAg_fistsOfF_untouch_rele: Brutes with the skills Feline Agility, Fists of Fury, Untouchable and Relentless.
achievements.vita_armor_toughened.descri: Brutes with the skills Vitality, Armor and Toughened Skin.
achievements.herculStr_hammer_fierceBrut: Brutes with the skills Herculean Strength, Piledriver and Fierce Brute.
achievements.balletShoes_survival.descri: Brutes with the skills Ballet Shoes and Survival.
achievements.cryOfTheDamned_hypnosis.des: Brutes with the skills Cry of the Damned and Hypnosis.
achievements.shield_counterAttack.descri: Brutes with the skills Shield and Counter Attack.
achievements.reconnaissance_monk.descrip: Brutes with the skills Reconnaissance and Monk.
achievements.doubleBoost.description: Brutes with two skills that increase stats.
achievements.tripleBoost.description: Brutes with three skills that increase stats.
achievements.quadrupleBoost.description: Brutes with four skills that increase stats.
achievements.regeneration_potion.descrip: Brutes with the skills Regeneration and Tragic Potion.
achievements.bear_tamer.description: Brutes with a bear and the skill Tamer.
achievements.monk_sixthSense_whip.descri: Brutes with the skills Monk, Sixth Sense and a Whip.
achievements.weaponsMaster_sharp_bodybui: Brutes with the skills Weapons Master, Bodybuilder and at least one Heavy weapon and one Sharp weapon.
achievements.hostility_counterWeapon.des: Brutes with the skill Hostility and a weapon that can retaliate.
achievements.flashFlood_twelveWeapons.de: Brutes with the skill Flash Flood and at least twelve weapons.
achievements.lightningBolt_firstStrike.d: Brutes with the skills Lightning Bolt and First Strike.
achievements.herculeanStrength.descripti: Brutes with the skill Herculean Strength.
achievements.felineAgility.description: Brutes with the skill Feline Agility.
achievements.lightningBolt.description: Brutes with the skill Lightning Bolt.
achievements.potion_chef.description: Brutes with the skills Tragic Potion and Chef.
achievements.tamer_net.description: Brutes with the skills Tamer and Net.
achievements.untouchable_balletShoes.des: Brutes with the skills Untouchable and Ballet Shoes.
achievements.survival_resistant.descript: Brutes with the skills Survival and Resistant.
achievements.hideaway_spy.description: Brutes with the skills Hideaway and Spy.
achievements.weaponsLong3: Isn't that the size that counts?
achievements.thor.description: Brutes with a hammer and the skill Hideaway.
achievements.deflector.description: Brutes with the skill Repulse and two weapons that can deflect.
achievements.allLongWeapons: Isn't that the size that counts?
achievements.winTournamentAs20.descripti: Win a tournament with a level 20 or less brute.
achievements.winTournamentAs15.descripti: Win a tournament with a level 15 or less brute.
achievements.looseAgainst2.description: Lose a fight against a brute whose level is twice lower than yours.
achievements.looseAgainst3.description: Lose a fight against a brute whose level is three times lower than yours.
achievements.looseAgainst4.description: Lose a fight against a brute whose level is four times lower than yours.
achievements.winAgainst2.description: Win a fight against a brute whose level is twice higher than yours.
achievements.winAgainst3.description: Win a fight against a brute whose level is three times higher than yours.
achievements.winAgainst4.description: Win a fight against a brute whose level is four times higher than yours.
achievements.winAsLower.description: Win a tournament against a brute whose level is higher than yours.
achievements.rankUp10.description: Rank up a brute to Desert Batterer
achievements.rankUp9.description: Rank up a brute to Sticking Plaster Ripper
achievements.rankUp8.description: Rank up a brute to Richter Thumper
achievements.rankUp6.description: Rank up a brute to Vengeful Flame
achievements.rankUp5.description: Rank up a brute to Berserker Soul
achievements.rankUp4.description: Rank up a brute to Hemogoblin
achievements.rankUp3.description: Rank up a brute to Sword Swallower
achievements.rankUp2.description: Rank up a brute to Satan's Biceps
achievements.rankUp1.description: Rank up a brute to The Dentist of Chaos
achievements.rankUp0.description: Rank up a brute to Brutal Legend
achievements.beta.description: Thank you for participating in MyBrute's beta!
achievements.bug.description: Report and help fix a bug.
notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.subtitle: The page you are looking for does not exist.
bruteNotFound.title: Brute not found
bruteNotFound.subtitle: The brute you are looking for does not exist or has been sacrificed.
generatingTournaments: We are generating today's tournaments. Please wait for a few minutes.
reportConfirm: Are you sure you want to report the brute name {{brute}} as inappropriate?
dinoRpgRewardsSuccess: Congratz! You gained an extra fight for each of your brutes.
inventory.desc: Here you can see all the items you accumulated. Use them wisely!
inventory.item.favoriteFight.desc: You can set a fight as your favorite on the fight page. It will not be deleted after 30 days.
inventory.itemNotImplemented: This item is not implemented yet.
taggedForDeletion: Your brute will be deleted in {{days}} days.
deletionReason.DUPLICATE_NAME: Your brute has the same name as another brute. Use the item in your inventory to change it and avoid deletion.
deletionReason.INNAPROPRIATE_NAME: Your brute has an inappropriate name. Use the item in your inventory to change it and avoid deletion.
deletionReason.EVENT_LOSS: Your brute lost in the event. It will be deleted in {{days}} days.
nameChangeConfirm: Are you sure you want to change your brute's name to {{name}}?
modifier.noThrows.desc: Who superglued those weapons ?! You can't throw your weapons anymore.
modifier.focusOpponent.desc: You never lost a staring battle. You will always focus your main opponent.
modifier.alwaysUseSupers.desc: You spent time learning those skills, it would be a shame not to use them. You will always use your available skills.
modifier.drawEveryWeapon.desc: Your pullout game is extremely strong. You will always draw a weapon if one is available.
modifier.doubleAgility.desc: You feel lighter than usual today. Your agility is doubled.
modifier.randomSkill.desc: You watched so many fights that you can managed to learn a new skill. You gain a random skill for the day.
modifier.randomWeapon.desc: You found a weapon on the ground. You gain a random weapon for the day.
modifier.bareHandsFirstHit.desc: A true gentleman greets their enemy with their fists. You will not draw a weapon until you hit your opponent with your bare hands.
modifier.startWithWeapon.desc: No time for pleasantries, it's time to fight! You will start the fight with a weapon already drawn.
newPatchNotesAvailable: A new version has been released.
unbanConfirm: Are you sure you want to unban this user?
banConfirm: Are you sure you want to ban this user?
eventBrute: This brute was created for the current event.
noEvent: There is no event ongoing, come back later!
event.battleRoyale.desc: In this event, players can create a new special brute that will participate in a battle royale. The event winner will get to keep the winning brute. Other brutes will be permanently deleted after the event.
event.battleRoyale.rule.3: {{count}} fights per day, one level per win
event.battleRoyale.rule.4: {{count}} free resets. Resets give you enough XP to get back to your current level
event.battleRoyale.rule.5: A tournament round will be played every day until only one brute remains
event.battleRoyale.rule.6: The winner will keep its destiny, reset to level 1 and become a regular brute
event.battleRoyale.rule.7: All other brutes will be permanently deleted
event.battleRoyale.rule.8: The next event will start {{count}} days after the end of the current event
event.battleRoyale.rule.9: Every event has a random maximum level, the current event maximum level is {{count}}
event.ongoing: This event is already ongoing, you can't participate with a brute anymore.
event.started: A new event just started, come participate before it's too late!
youWillAscendWith: You have chosen to ascend with the {{perkName}} {{perkType}}.
youMustSelectToAscend: You must select a weapon, skill or pet to ascend.
ascensionExplanationText: Ascending allows you to start over with one additional permanent perk. You will reset to level 1 but keep your rank, previous ascension rewards, and the perk you are about to select.
rankingPrioritizeAscensions: The rankings prioritize the amount of ascensions over experience and level !
wiki.restartAfterRankup: You will then restart at lvl 1 with the same destiny, but with the possibility to make different level up choices if you want to.
wiki.previousDestiny: The previous destiny will be highlighted in red when leveling up.
wiki.noSacrificeSameDay: You can't sacrifice a brute the day of its creation.
wiki.sameNameAfterSacrifice: Once sacrified, you can create a new brute using the same name.
wiki.activePreviousDay: Must have fought the previous day
wiki.addedDelayedXP: If you won {{daily}} fights in the daily tournament and {{global}} fights in the global tournament, you'll get {{total}} XP the following day.
wiki.resetExample: At some point you might want to reset your brute because you didn't like what you got after level 10 for example; or you might want to explore another branch of your destiny.
wiki.resetExample2: It will cost you 100 gold and your brute will restart at level 1 with the same rank.
wiki.bossExplanation: The boss has a given amount of HP, it will require multiple daily fights to beat it. Once you defeat it, you will unlock 5 more brutes slots for your clan (50 members limit). You will also earn a boss ticket (no utility yet) & gold.
wiki.pupilExplanation: Pupils don't give XP as they used to in previous game versions. But you can still get pupils by sharing the link in the top right corner of your cell.
bruteSetForDeletion: One of your brutes has been set for deletion.
